frame.name: Precision Frame
frame.description:
Compound Bow. Longer draw time optimized for damage. 
[Reload]  : Use while drawn to cancel the shot.

perks.description:
Durable yet light bowstring.
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases stability
perks.name: Agile Bowstring

perks.description:
Stable, high-friction bowstring.
  •  Slightly increases accuracy
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Tactile String

perks.description:
Excellent snapback.
  •  Decreases accuracy
  •  Faster draw time
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
perks.name: Elastic String

perks.description:
Light and easy to draw.
  •  Slightly faster draw time
  •  Slightly decreases accuracy
  •  Increases handling speed
perks.name: Flexible String

perks.description:
Tightly strung bow.
  •  Greatly increases accuracy
  •  Slightly slower draw time
  •  Slightly decreases stability
perks.name: High Tension String

perks.description:
Simple balanced string.
  •  Slightly increases accuracy
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases stability
perks.name: Natural String

perks.description:
Unbreakable bowstring.
  •  Slightly increases accuracy
  •  Slightly faster draw time
perks.name: Polymer String

perks.description:
Light and stable shaft material. 
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Carbon Arrow Shaft

perks.description:
Thinner arrows to increase nocking speed and weapon handling.
  •  Increases handling speed 
  •  Increases reload speed
perks.name: Compact Arrow Shaft

perks.description:
Heavy and consistent. 
  •  Greatly increases accuracy
  •  Slightly decreases stability
perks.name: Fiberglass Arrow Shaft

perks.description:
Aerodynamic and light. 
  •  Slightly increases accuracy
  •  Slightly increases stability
perks.name: Helical Fletching

perks.description:
Feather-light with good control.
  •  Slightly decreases accuracy
  •  Greatly increases stability
perks.name: Natural Fletching

perks.description:
Modern fletching for straight paths. 
  •  Increases accuracy
perks.name: Straight Fletching

perks.description:
Throwing a grenade or hitting a target with a charged melee grants a stacking bonus to weapon stability, handling, and range.

Using a Super grants maximum stacks.
perks.name: Well-Rounded

perks.description: Increases handling, reload speed, and stability for each fully charged ability.
perks.name: Surplus

perks.description: Improved handling and reload speed when allies are nearby.
perks.name: Ensemble

perks.description: Shooting an ammo brick picks it up and automatically reloads all of your equipped weapons from reserves.
perks.name: Shoot to Loot

perks.description: Increases hold time and reload speed, and prevents radar pings from shooting while crouched.
perks.name: Sneak Bow

perks.description: This weapon gains bonus stability, handling, and reload speed while the wielder is in motion.
perks.name: Perpetual Motion

perks.description: Draw time decreases after every precision hit.
perks.name: Archer's Tempo

perks.description: Aiming this weapon increases its effective range and zoom magnification. Increased projectile velocity while aiming Rocket Launchers, Grenade Launchers, and Bows.
perks.name: Rangefinder

perks.description: Increased movement speed and target acquisition when moving while aiming down sights.
perks.name: Moving Target

perks.description: This weapon can be drawn unbelievably fast.
perks.name: Quickdraw

perks.description: Aiming this weapon for a short period reduces flinch.
perks.name: No Distractions

perks.description: Final blows grant increased mobility, weapon range, and handling for a short duration.
perks.name: Killing Wind

perks.description: Kills with this weapon generate ability energy. This energy is divided between your uncharged abilities.
perks.name: Wellspring

perks.description: This weapon gains increased damage and handling from final blows with grenades or this weapon.
perks.name: Adrenaline Junkie

perks.description:
Defeating a target spreads scorch to those nearby.
More powerful combatants and opposing Guardians cause scorch in a larger radius.
perks.name: Incandescent

perks.description: Arrows explode after a short delay.
perks.name: Explosive Head

perks.description: Final blows with other weapons improve this weapon's damage and performance for a short duration.
perks.name: Harmony

perks.description: Increased damage against bosses, vehicles, and Guardians with their Super active.
perks.name: Vorpal Weapon

perks.description: Using this weapon to break the shield of a combatant or a Guardian using their Super will grant you an overshield.
perks.name: Turnabout

perks.description: Faster charge time or draw time when surrounded by combatants.
perks.name: Cornered

perks.description: Each final blow increases charge/draw speed.
perks.name: Successful Warm-Up

perks.description: Precision kills create an elemental damage explosion.
perks.name: Dragonfly

perks.description: Kills with this weapon temporarily grant increased damage. Stacks 3x.
perks.name: Rampage

perks.description: Improved accuracy and range on the opening shot of attack.
perks.name: Opening Shot

perks.description: Final blows with this weapon grant a small amount of health.
perks.name: Vanguard's Vindication
